text: The new core HubSpot Image Slider module, is there any way to remove the linking feature? i.e. I don’t want anything to happen when you click on the slides.

It seems like setting it to an External link and using # works, even though HubSpot complains and says it’s not a valid URL. It will still show # in the address bar when they click it though, so not ideal, but it works.

Hi thinktank : Hoping someone might have some insights into this issue -  can confirm the HubSpot account has top level admin access so it isn't that...why else would we not be able to access workflows via the zap integration into LeadPages? TIA
It should be optional, like it is with the Image module, imo.
